This equipment/s is used to create signals or capture responses from electronic devices under test (DUTs). In this way, the proper operation of the DUT can be proven or faults in the device can be traced. Use of electronic test equipment is essential to any serious work on electronics systems. The following items are used for troubleshooting in electronics.

A test tool used to measure two or more electrical values, principally voltage (volts), current (amps) and resistance (ohms). It is a standard diagnostic tool for technicians in the electrical/electronic industries.
It is an electrical device that supplies electric power to an electrical load.
An equipment that test and displays voltage signals as waveforms, visual representations of the variation of voltage over time.
The most important tool. A hand tool that supplies heat to melt solder so that it can flow into the joint between two work pieces.
A fusible metal alloy used to create a permanent bond between metal work pieces.
This is essential for cutting small, thick wires and excess legs in electronic components.
It is a tool used for stripping the electrical insulation of wires. It commonly has measurements for various wire gauges.
A common tool used by everyone. It is used for inserting and removing screws. A screwdriver set is a set of screwdriver in different sizes and head designs.
Same as its bigger version, a precision screwdriver is used for inserting and removing small screws.

A simple piece of electronic test equipment used to determine the presence or absence of an electric voltage a piece of equipment under test. Properly designed test lights include features to protect the user from accidental electric shock.
A measuring tool for wire diameters. This determines the amount of electric current a wire can safely carry, as well as its electrical resistance and weight.

In electric work, it is used to measure the diameter of wire/conductors in a circuit/appliance. Because some appliances have little to no free space it is difficult to use a wire gauge, micrometer is used because its smaller and it measures accurately.

A tool used to check wiring when surges appear to be happening frequently, especially in older homes where older wiring could be faulty. They can also locate which circuits are having trouble. There are different types of ammeters. Some ammeters measure direct current, and some measure alternating current.

An instrument for measuring the in watts of any given circuit. An electricity meter, electrical meter, or energy meter, or a watt meter is a device that measures the amount of electric energy consumed by a residence, a business, or an electrically powered device.
It is flexible and used to measure distance and object dimensions.
When using this tool, first is you need to: Calibrate the tool at frequent intervals, Protect the instrument from dust, moisture and heat careful when measuring high voltages
When using this tool, you need to: Use a high quality test light, poorly made ones uses low quality materials and might catch fire if it was contacted to high voltage.
When using this tool, you need to: Be careful when measuring high voltages

When using this tool, you need to:
> Make sure that the measuring tape has been returned to zero
> Check if there are rust, wear or scratch etc. in the surface of the measuring tape.
> Clean the burrs, grease or slag on the surface
> Clean with clean soft cloth or dust free paper"	1
